#define orxSTRUCTURE_GET_POINTER(STRUCTURE, TYPE)   ((orx##TYPE *)_orxStructure_GetPointer(STRUCTURE, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_##TYPE))
#define orxSTRUCTURE(STRUCTURE)   (((STRUCTURE != orxNULL) && ((((orxSTRUCTURE *)STRUCTURE)->eID ^ orxSTRUCTURE_MAGIC_NUMBER) < orxSTRUCTURE_ID_NUMBER)) ? (orxSTRUCTURE *)STRUCTURE : (orxSTRUCTURE *)orxNULL)

#define orxSTRUCTURE_ASSERT(STRUCTURE)

enum  __orxSTRUCTURE_ID_t {
  orxSTRUCTURE_ID_ANIMPOINTER = 0, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_BODY, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_FRAME, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_FXPOINTER,
  orxSTRUCTURE_ID_GRAPHIC, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_SOUNDPOINTER, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_SPAWNER, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_LINKABLE_NUMBER,
  orxSTRUCTURE_ID_ANIM = orxSTRUCTURE_ID_LINKABLE_NUMBER, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_ANIMSET, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_CAMERA, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_FX,
  orxSTRUCTURE_ID_OBJECT, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_SOUND, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_TEXTURE, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_VIEWPORT,
  orxSTRUCTURE_ID_NUMBER, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_NONE = orxENUM_NONE
}
enum  __orxSTRUCTURE_STORAGE_TYPE_t { orxSTRUCTURE_STORAGE_TYPE_LINKLIST = 0, orxSTRUCTURE_STORAGE_TYPE_TREE, orxSTRUCTURE_STORAGE_TYPE_NUMBER, orxSTRUCTURE_STORAGE_TYPE_NONE = orxENUM_NONE }

Detailed Description

Structure module Allows to creates and handle structures. Structures can be referenced by other structures (or objects).

  orxASSERT((((orxSTRUCTURE *)(STRUCTURE))->eID ^ orxSTRUCTURE_MAGIC_NUMBER) < orxSTRUCTURE_ID_NUMBER);
